page.title: 10THE SANDAY KNITTING ASSOC.
page.content:
The{Sanday Knitting Association}is a co-operative whose members knit special woollen goods which are then exported to many corners of the world. Before being packed, all goods are inspected to ensure that they are the proper size, neatly knitted and that the colours are correct and in the proper place.
The manageress in charge is{Mrs. {Elspeth Sinclair.}She takes orders and opens{The Wool Hall}where inspections take place and where visitors and local people can view the goods every other Wednesday night. The Wool Hall is situated in{Lady Village,}and there are over 100 people who knit for the association - not only in Sanday - but also in other parts of Orkney and even the mainland of Scotland.
